snippet: Quarterback Kolton Browning’s 16-yard touchdown run on fourth-and-1 lifted Louisiana-Monroe to a 34-31 overtime win over the No. 8 Razorbacks on Saturday night in Little Rock.
abstract: College Football Top 25 Roundup; Louisiana-Monroe earns a 34-31 overtime victory over Arkansas; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Kolton Browning’s 16-yard touchdown run on fourth-and-1 lifted Louisiana-Monroe to a 34-31 overtime win over the No. 8 Razorbacks on Saturday night in Little Rock.

headline.seo: Touchdown in Overtime Lifts Louisiana-Monroe to an Upset of Arkansas
headline.main: Touchdown in Overtime Lifts Louisiana-Monroe to an Upset of Arkansas
headline.print_headline: Touchdown in Overtime Lifts Louisiana-Monroe To an Upset of Arkansas
